analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/19/0x5498644ac4c6bd00cc4f50ad0d6c983ada8196eb.sol:

	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0x5498644ac4c6bd00cc4f50ad0d6c983ada8196eb.sol#269-270)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
